artist: Author: Sylvie LS. , et al.; Editor: Juls Generic; Publisher: The Purple Thistle Center, Vancouver , et al.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress and an abstracted photographic image of two locked bicycles, printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 40 pp.
title: Stoked on Spokes: a community cycling resource guide
